title: Inside Jennifer Aniston's walk-in wardrobe with three lavish closets and glowing accessory displays
text:

Jennifer Aniston's stylists have given fans a glimpse inside the A-Lister's dreamy walk-wardrobe.

The 50-year-old star, who recently joined Instagram , boasts three door-less closets with perfectly folded clothes and accessories lining the shelves and rails.

Stylist duo Nina and Clare Hallworth shared a picture of their client Jennifer reportedly posing in her fantasy dressing room to Instagram on Tuesday.

The Friends icon looked totally stylish as she posed up a storm wearing a chic, black trench coat and glamorous strappy sandals.

Eagle-eyed fans quickly commented on the star's incredible wardrobe backdrop.

(Image: Instagram)

One user posted: "Closet envy."

While another one shared: ""Her wardrobe!" followed by heart eyes and mouth drooling emojis.

The snaps teased a glance at Jennifer's classic clothing rails which appeared full of shoes, designer handbags and perfectly colour-coordinated outfits.

(Image: Instagram)

We can imagine that the dark oak floor acts as the perfect runway for the A-lister to try on outfits for glitzy star-studded bashes and award shows.

The lavish ceiling spotlights offered the perfect lighting for the stylists Instagram snap of the actress.

Other photos show a glimpse of Jennifer's dazzling accessories cabinet with see-through glass doors shining with glowing lights and a huge lit-up mirror.

(Image: Instagram)

She's already racked up more than 10 million followers since joining Instagram this week.

Jen will soon be storming back to our screens in new comedy-drama, The Morning Show .

The series focuses on Alex Levy (played by Jen), alongside Reese Witherspoon's character, deal with sexism in the workplace among other relatable, down-to-earth challenges.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The actress, who shot to fame as Rachel Green in the American sitcom, uploaded her first post onto the social networking site on Tuesday.

Jennifer's social media debut comes after she admitted she is not keen on taking part in a Friends reboot.

She told Howard Stern's Sirius XM Radio show: "We all miss it every day. I would be nothing without it […] If there’s a reboot of the show, it won’t be as good as what it was, so why do it? It would ruin it."
description: The Hollywood icon boasts a swanky dressing room with three bespoke closets, a stylish walkway and a dazzling accessories display
